statements: DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 100 AND total_amount > 500;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND customer_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01')
DELETE FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE c.customer_address LIKE '%New York%'
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders WHERE order_date < '2023-01-01');
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith');
DELETE FROM order_details WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE price > 100);
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM order_details WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE price < 100);
